title: Drawing Tour: The Artist’s Process
short_description: Get to know the museum’s collection in new ways through conversation with a teaching artist and short sketching exercises designed for all drawing levels. All materials are provided.
description:
Get to know the museum’s collection in new ways through conversation with a teaching artist and short sketching exercises designed for all drawing levels. All materials are provided.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
buy_button_caption:
Free with museum admission, no registration required
The museum is to free to Illinois residents during this event and every Wednesday evening, 5:00–8:00.
